kinky.Toggle.android:title: Multi Photos
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: when sharing photos you can send more than one at once

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Disable Video Chat
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: ever accidentally click the video chat toggle and face expose? Well this should help you prevent that

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Gif Favorites
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: store your the gifs you like in gif tray

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Blur Media
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: incoming media in public groups will be censored

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Admin Badges
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: displays who is admin in chat

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Public Group Notifications
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: changes the mute button in chat info

kinky.List.android:title: Group Descriptions
kinky.List.android:summary: if admin you make set a bio for your group chat

kinky.Toggle.android:title: New Chat Reporting
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: when someone new messages you there is a button for if you wish to report them

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Disable isTyping
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: other users will not be able to see when you are typing

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Fake Camera
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: gallery pictures you send will appear as being sent from camera

kinky.List.android:title: Read Receipts
kinky.List.android:summary: choose whether other users know if you read their messages or not

kinky.Toggle.android:title: No Pull
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: disables the pull to search feature on conversations

kinky.Toggle.android:title: Do Not Disturb
kinky.Toggle.android:summary: auto leave groups that you are added to
